Amalgamated Bank 
When it comes to our institutional investment platform, we offer a wide 
range of products and services to meet the investment needs of our 
customers, including equity, fixed income and custody services. 
We are a signatory to the  Principles for Responsible Investing (PRI),  
which means that we adhere to a voluntary set of investment principles 
that incorporate environmental, social and governance (ESG) issues 
into our investment practices.
